short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks a button multiple times per second. Specifically designed for Catslap's Slap-to-Earn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get to the top of the leaderboard on catslaptoken.com with Auto Catslap! 

This extension automatically clicks the Catslap for you several times per second so that also you can compete with the top cats! Designed specifically for catslaptoken.com to get more slaps for potential Airdrop rewards in the Slap-to-Earn game. 

Proven to create millions of registered slaps. 

In the full version:
- Adjust clicking speed (but don't go too fast or the website will not store your clicks).
- Automatic refresh so that nothing happens to your slaps.
- Mute the sound form the website so that you can keep browsing without the infernal sound of constant slapping.

Try a 7-day free trial (no credit card needed) with limited functions, or subscribe to use Auto Catslap in season after season of Slap-to-Earn. 

Payment handled securely with Stripe through ExtensionPay.
